testcase.name: Create Pix Order Deverá realizar a criação do Pix Order com sucesso
testcase.classname: Deverá realizar a criação do Pix Order com sucesso

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://partnerhuborderserviceqa.azurewebsites.net/api/Order/CreatePixOrder
The response we received from your web server was:
> 415: Unsupported Media Type
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: https://partnerhuborderserviceqa.azurewebsites.net/api/Order/CreatePixOrder Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/9.7.0 Chrome/100.0.4896.75 Electron/18.0.4 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-length": 0 }
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 415 - Unsupported Media Type Headers: { "content-length": "290", "content-type": "application/problem+json; charset=utf-8", "date": "Fri, 30 Sep 2022 18:13:11 GMT", "server": "Microsoft-IIS/10.0", "set-cookie": [ "ARRAffinity=2b4ef85523c8628779b336b1ae7771fb0c5e289014ef47912d911dceb47ba032;Path=/;HttpOnly;Secure;Domain=partnerhuborderserviceqa.azurewebsites.net", "ARRAffinitySameSite=2b4ef85523c8628779b336b1ae7771fb0c5e289014ef47912d911dceb47ba032;Path=/;HttpOnly;SameSite=None;Secure;Domain=partnerhuborderserviceqa.azurewebsites.net" ], "strict-transport-security": "max-age=2592000", "x-correlation-id": "4ba42dcf-1c1c-480a-8d70-dabc0cf20c02", "x-powered-by": "ASP.NET" } Body: { "$type": "Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson.AnnotatedProblemDetails, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson", "type": "https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-6.5.13", "title": "Unsupported Media Type", "status": 415, "traceId": "00-90e4021879c76cea83acb3a63cb63903-4d24c32da52913fd-00" }
